squabble
Class Squabble

WEB-INF.cftags.component
        squabble.Squabble

public class Squabble

extends WEB-INF.cftags.component

Service Layer for Squabble. To be instantiated on applications start up as a singleton.

calculateCombinations

public void calculateCombinations(string testName)
calculate all the combinations of a given test, into an array that can be looped through.

Parameters:
testName - the name of the test.

convert

public void convert(string testname, [string name='The name of this conversion'], [string value=''], [string units=''])
Track a conversion for the current visitor

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to track the conversion for.
name - The name/type of this conversion
value - The value to record for this conversion
units - The unit amount to record for this conversion

convertAll

public void convertAll([string name='The name of this conversion'], [string value=''], [string units=''])
Track a conversion for all registered tests

Parameters:
name - The name/type of this conversion
value - The value to record for this conversion
units - The unit amount to record for this conversion

disableTest

public void disableTest(string testname)
A quick and easy way to disable a test without having to go and remove all the aspects of the test from your application

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to disable.

getCurrentCombination

public struct getCurrentCombination(string testname)
get the current visitor combination. If an inactive visitor, returns an empty struct.

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the variations for.

getCurrentVisitorID

public string getCurrentVisitorID(string testname)
get the current visitor ID

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the combinations for.

getNextCombination

private struct getNextCombination(string testname)
gets the next combination of variations in the pool for this test

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the variation for.

getTestConfig

public struct getTestConfig(string testname)
get a specific test configuration

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the configuration for.

getTestVariationPool

private struct getTestVariationPool()

isActiveVariation

public boolean isActiveVariation(string testname, string section, string variation)
Convenience method to check if a specific variation is active for the current visitor

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the variations for.
section - the name of the section to check if it is active
variation - the name of the variation to check if it is active

isTestDisabled

public boolean isTestDisabled(string testname)
Whether or not a given test is disabled

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test potentially disabled.

isVisitorInPercentage

public boolean isVisitorInPercentage(string testname)
is the new visitor within the current percentage of visitors for this test

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test

listTestCombinations

public array listTestCombinations(string testname)
get all the combinations for all sections and variations for a given test

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to get the combinations for.

listTests

public array listTests()
list of all test names registered with squabble.

registerTest

public void registerTest(string testName, struct variations, [numeric percentageVisitorTraffic='100'], [struct options='[runtime expression]'])
Register a multivariate test with the system

Parameters:
testName - the name of the test. (500 character limit)
variations - Structure of variations. Should be in the format: { sectionName = [ variationName, variationName, variationName] }. Variation names should not include 'control', as it is a reserved word
percentageVisitorTraffic - A percentage from 0 to 100 of the amount of visitor traffic should be included in this test. Defaults to 100 percent
options - extra options to be added with this registration, to be used with other integration points, e.g. google analytics inegration

removeCombination

public void removeCombination(string testname, struct combination)
If you want to remove a combination from the generated list. Handy if you want to remove it from the test altoghether, or for removing poorly performing combinations.

Parameters:
testname - the name of the test to remove the combination from.
combination - the struct that represents the combination. Key is the section, value is the variation.

runTest

public void runTest(string testName)
This method needs to be run before calling 'getCurrentCombination'. It sets up the cookie and variation information for the current user, if it doesn't exist.

Parameters:
testName - the name of the test.

setTestVariationPool

private void setTestVariationPool(struct testVariationPool)

Parameters:
testVariationPool
